sys_script_include.name: cpUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_c9a6579e2f4c2410edca2d6df699b695
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_535557_cred.cpUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>cpUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var cpUtils = Class.create();
cpUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    appendSkills: function(user_id, skill_array) {
        for (var i = 0; i < skill_array.length; i++) {
            var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_skill');
            gr.initialize();
            gr.user = user_id;
            gr.skill = skill_array[i];
            gr.insert();
            gs.info('Skill ' + skill_array[i] + ' has been added to user ' + user_id.name);
        }
    },

    type: 'cpUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin.muli</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-26 18:46:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>c9a6579e2f4c2410edca2d6df699b695</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cpUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Credential Portfolio" source="x_535557_cred">d1aa07882f80a010edca2d6df699b614</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Credential Portfolio">d1aa07882f80a010edca2d6df699b614</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c9a6579e2f4c2410edca2d6df699b695</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin.muli</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-26 18:46:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
